body.p: The IASB decided that, after the commencement date, a lessee should measure the right-of-use asset at cost less accumulated depreciation and accumulated impairment losses, adjusted for remeasurements of the lease liability (see paragraph BC192). Paragraphs BC41–BC56 include a detailed discussion of the feedback received on the lessee accounting model and the basis for the IASB’s decisions regarding the subsequent measurement of a lessee’s right-of-use asset.
